info.title: The Guardian
info.description: The Guardian Content API is a public service for accessing all the content the Guardian creates and the collections we have of that content (tags and sections). There are over one and a half million items available published as far back as 1999. This overview will give you some idea of what data is available, how to find what you need, and what you will see when you make a request to us.

get.description: Searches news content across the Guardian news platform.
Retrieves the tags used across the Guardian news platform.
Retrieves the sections used across the Guardian news platform.
Retrieves the editions of the Guardian news platform.
